Index >  BackgroundColor

BackgroundColor

Description

Returns or sets the background color of the Dynamic Web TWAIN viewer. It is a value specifying the 24-bit RGB value.

Data type

<int>

Syntax

.BackgroundColor = 0xffffff;

Remarks

Default is white (0xffffff). The byte-ordering of the 24-bit RGB value is BBGGRR. BB represents blue, GG represents green and RR represents red.
